column1: Kaitlyn Robins,  Jon Rodriguez, and  Brittany Shaffer
09/12/1951 0 Born in Schenectady, New York, with the original name of Paul
1952 0-1 Deemed unadoptable after being neglected by birth parent(s)
1953 1 Adopted by Norma & Eugene Stano, changed named to Gerald
Killed neighbor’s chicks, had trouble in school relating to others, and he bullied other
Arrested for throwing a stone from an overpass onto a moving vehicle and for pulling
1967 15-16 Family moved to PA. Started stealing money and skipping school
Drinking and drug use occurred after having to have a child aborted because the girl’s
father demanded it. Angela, the girl, was mentally retarded.
Finally, after many attempts, graduated high school and went to a computer trade
1972-1973 20-21 school. Moved out to become independent. Continued stealing money at his places of
employment and was forced to move back in with parents
1973 21-22 Ann Arceneaux and Janine Marie Litogino are found dead.
01/19/1974 22 Cathy Lee Scarf was found dead.
1974 22-23 Barbara Ann Baur and another woman, never identified, are both found dead.
1975 23 Arrested for forging a check from his employer
06/21/1975 23 Married Teresa Esposito, a 22 year-old hairdresser (real name unsure of).
January 1976 24 Linda Hamilton is also found dead.
May 1976 24 Ramona Neel is found dead.
Teresa Esposito (unsure of real name) divorces Stano, after abusing her since
December 1976 25 Susan Bickrest is found dead.

column3: Mary Kathleen Muldoon found dead.
Diana Valldeck, Christina Goodson, Joan Foster, Sandra Dubose, Bonnie Hughes,Susan Basile, Emily Branch, & Phoebe Winston all found dead.
Dorothy Williams found dead.
Mary Carol Maher found dead.
Donna Hensley reports her assault and ID Gerald Stano as her assailant
Stano was brought in to be questioned about the assault on Donna Hensley to whichhis confesses along with the murder of Mary Carol Maher.
Toni Van Haddock’s body found to which Stano confesses to murdering her.
Sentenced to three life terms for the murders of Nancy Heard, Mary Carol Maher,Toni Van Haddocks

Confesses to16 more murders. Including: Ann Arceneaux,Janine Marie Ligotino, Barbara Bauer, Cathy Lee Scharf, Diana Lynn Valleck, SusanBasile, Susan Bickrest, Bonnie Hughes, Emily Branch, Joan Gail Foster, MaryKathleen Muldoon, Sandra DuBose, Christine Goodson, Dorothy Williams, & PhoebeWinston
Sentenced to death after waiving the right to a trial and pleading guilty to the murdersof Susan Bickrest and Mary Kathleen Muldoon.
Convicted and given the death penalty to the murder of Cathy Lee Sharf.
Second death warrant signed.
Second appeal filed which is denied, managed to delay his execution
Governor of Florida signs 3rd death warrant
Files 3rd appeal which is denied
Executed by electric chair.
